settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.heading: Detail
settings.content:
• No brush required
  • No glue required
  • No scissors required
  • Genuine license
  • Printed parts & new creation style
  • Eye & chest glow
  • Rich mobility
  • Classic scene restoration

Unbox the limited edition Transformers 2024 Yearly Version: The Golden Lagoon! This collection features five unique figures, each with a limited edition gold coating and upgraded glowing features. With special lighting modules, fluorescent materials, and 20+ points of articulation, these figures bring your favorite characters to life in vibrant detail.

The legendary tale of Cybertron continues here! When the mysterious Golden Lagoon appears, Cybertron warriors gain unbreakable bodies. How will the scales of victory tip?

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
• The package and manual contain essential information, so please retain them. Standalone batteries for lighting pose a risk to little children; keep them out of reach to prevent accidental swallowing.

  • For individuals aged 10 and above, please install under the supervision of a guardian. After disassembling, dispose of or recycle the batteries correctly.

  • If not in use for an extended period, disassemble. Clean the toy with a dry cloth.

  • Note: The package includes small parts. Avoid swallowing them, and ensure that children under three years old do not have access to them.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
• Transformer Figure x 5
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 5
  • Instruction Manual x 1

settings.text: Unleash a luminescent world of adventure with 5 authentically licensed, golden-coated figures. Featuring printed parts, glowing eyes and chests, and rich articulation.

settings.heading: Transformers: Radiant Legends of the Golden Lagoon
settings.text: Each character is meticulously recreated with their signature features and weapons, all enhanced by the golden finish representing their invincibility after exposure to the Golden Lagoon. This lineup allows fans to recreate key moments from this classic Transformers tale.

Glowing eyes and chest parts bring your figures to life with vibrant light, enhancing the visual appeal of your collection.
Officially licensed, ensuring authenticity and high-quality craftsmanship for all figures.
Enjoy hassle-free assembly with no need for brushes, glue, or cutters—just pure fun right out of the box.

Featuring 20+ points of articulation, these figures offer rich, movable joints for dynamic poses and action-packed displays.
Relive iconic moments from the Transformers series with figurines designed to capture the essence of classic animation scenes.

The special figure in this series is produced in a ratio of 1:36.
1/36 means that for every 36 Transformers produced, there is 1 special figure.

settings.block_title: What sets The Golden Lagoon apart from other Transformers figures?
settings.block_text: The Golden Lagoon is distinguished by its limited edition golden coating, advanced luminous effects, including glowing eyes and chest features, and 20+ points of articulation for dynamic posing. These figures come with exclusive characters and premium details, making them highly desirable for collectors.

settings.block_title: Are the materials used in The Golden Lagoon safe for children?
settings.block_text: Yes, the figures in The Golden Lagoon are made from high-quality, non-toxic ABS materials that meet stringent safety standards. They are designed to be both durable and safe, ensuring peace of mind for parents.

settings.block_title: What is included in each The Golden Lagoon package?
settings.block_text: Each Golden Lagoon package includes five Transformer figures with weapon accessories or poseable hands and five display stands. No tools are required. Follow the included instruction manual for easy setup, and enjoy your energon cube to enhance the display.

settings.block_title: Are these figures suitable for both play and display?
settings.block_text: Absolutely! The Golden Lagoon figures are designed with high articulation, making them perfect for dynamic play. Their detailed paintwork and exclusive luminous effects also make them ideal for display. The themed bases enhance the overall presentation, making them perfect for showcasing.

settings.block_title: What makes The Golden Lagoon edition special for collectors?
settings.block_text: The Golden Lagoon features a limited edition golden coating, exclusive weapon accessories (laser cannon, leadership module, energon axe), and 20+ points of articulation. These figures also come with custom effect parts, hero-specific display stands, and special luminous effects, making them highly collectible.

settings.block_title: How do the luminous effects work on these figures?
settings.block_text: The luminous effects on The Golden Lagoon figures are achieved through special glowing mechanisms integrated into their bodies. These features include luminous eyes and a luminous chest, creating a stunning visual effect that enhances the overall appearance of the figures, making them truly shine.

settings.block_title: What age range is The Golden Lagoon suitable for?
settings.block_text: The Golden Lagoon is recommended for children aged 10 and up. The figures offer a blend of fun and creativity, providing an enjoyable and slightly challenging experience that is perfect for growing minds.

settings.block_title: How do I assemble The Golden Lagoon figures and do they come with any special accessories?
settings.block_text: Assembling The Golden Lagoon figures is simple and straightforward. The pre-painted ABS pieces snap together effortlessly, guided by the included instructions. There is no need for additional tools such as glue, brushes, or cutters, making the assembly process quick and enjoyable. Each figure comes with unique accessories such as laser cannons, Matrix of Leadership, and energon axes, enhancing the play experience and allowing for the recreation of iconic scenes from the Transformers universe.

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
